intro: Boehmeria meifenggensis, commonly known as the Meifenggeng bamboo grass, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, ovate leaves with a slightly hairy surface. It produces tiny greenish-white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. This species is often found in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions.
